segments.text: Dental clinic . This is Mr . Adams .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hi . My name's David Johnson . I'd like to make an appointment .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right , David . Is this for a checkup or a cleaning ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A checkup . I think I have a bad cavity . Half the side of my head hurts .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What tooth is giving you pain ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me see ... We can see you this afternoon if you can come in at four thirty .
segments.speaker: S1
